import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useAuthStore } from '../store/auth' import { FaRegClock, FaBriefcase, FaPlus, FaExternalLinkAlt } from 'react-icons/fa' import SubmitProject from '../components/SubmitProject' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' const AlluserProjects = () => { const { allProjects, getallProjetcs } = useAuthStore() const [isPopup, setIsPopup] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { getallProjetcs() }, []) return ( <>

postedProjects

Explore projects shared by our alumni and students in the geospatial field.

{isPopup && } {allProjects.length === 0 ? (
📁

No Projects Found

Get started by submitting your first project!

) : (
{allProjects.map((project) => (
{/* User Information at the top */}
{project.userId.avatar && ( )}
{project.userId.firstName} {project.userId.lastName}
{project.userId.email}
{new Date(project.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Project Image */} {project.image ? (
) : (
)} {/* Project Content */}
{project.title}

{project.description}

Resources
{project.resources}
{/* Action Button */}
))}
)}
) } export default AlluserProjects
